description: This file defines a Flutter widget, HomeShell, which provides a bottom navigation bar with five primary tabs (Dashboard, Customers, Inventory, Sales, Settings). It manages navigation between different pages via an IndexedStack and a NavigationBar, facilitating the main shell UI for the application.

classes.name: HomeShell
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that represents the main shell of the application, containing a bottom navigation bar with five primary pages.

classes.name: _HomeShellState
classes.description: The state class for HomeShell, managing the current selected index and rendering the corresponding page.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for this widget, returning an instance of _HomeShellState.

methods.name: _HomeShellState
methods.description: State class that maintains the current index and handles building the UI with navigation.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, returning a Scaffold with IndexedStack and NavigationBar for page navigation.
